c. trachomatis.gloss: bacteria responsible for the sexually transmitted diseases chlamydia and lymphogranuloma venereum

ct.gloss: a method of examining body organs by scanning them with X rays and using a computer to construct a series of cross-sectional scans along a single axis

ctc.gloss: an agency that helps the Director of Central Intelligence coordinate counterterrorist efforts in order to preempt and disrupt and defeat terrorist activities at the earliest possible stage

ctene.gloss: a locomotor organ consisting of a row of strong cilia whose bases are fused

ctenocephalides canis.gloss: flea that attacks dogs and cats

ctenocephalides felis.gloss: flea that breeds chiefly on cats and dogs and rats

ctenocephalus.gloss: a former usage synonymous with Ctenocephalides

ctenophore.gloss: biradially symmetrical hermaphroditic solitary marine animals resembling jellyfishes having for locomotion eight rows of cilia arranged like teeth in a comb
